title: Error when uploading car images
description: Users encounter an error when trying to upload images of their cars. The upload process fails unexpectedly.

title: Incorrect display of car details on user profile
description: Certain details of cars are not displayed correctly on the user profile page. This includes information such as model year, mileage, and features.

title: Search feature not returning relevant car results
description: The search functionality on the website fails to return relevant results when users search for specific car models or features.

title: Unable to add car to favorites
description: Users are unable to add cars to their list of favorite vehicles. Clicking the 'Add to Favorites' button does not produce any action.

title: Crash when accessing car details page
description: The website crashes or becomes unresponsive when users attempt to view the detailed information page of a specific car listing.

title: Incorrect calculation of total car price
description: The system calculates the total price of a car incorrectly, leading to discrepancies between the displayed price and the actual amount.

title: UI overlap issue on car comparison page
description: There is an issue with the user interface where elements overlap or are displayed incorrectly on the car comparison page, making it difficult to compare different vehicles.

title: Error when submitting car review
description: Users encounter an error message when attempting to submit a review for a car they have purchased or test-driven. The review submission process fails.

title: Sudden logout when accessing car forum
description: Users are unexpectedly logged out of their accounts when trying to access the car forum section of the website. This occurs without any user action.

title: Inconsistent loading times on car listings
description: The loading times for car listings vary inconsistently, with some pages loading quickly while others take a longer time to display content.

title: Incorrect sorting of car search results
description: The sorting algorithm for displaying search results is not functioning correctly. Results are displayed out of order or do not match the selected sorting criteria.

title: Broken link on car specifications page
description: There is a broken hyperlink on the car specifications page that leads to an incorrect or non-existent destination when clicked by users.

title: Unable to access car purchase history
description: Users encounter an error message or are unable to access their car purchase history section of the website. This prevents them from viewing past purchases.

title: Security vulnerability in car payment processing
description: A security vulnerability has been identified in the payment processing system for car purchases. This poses a risk of unauthorized access or data breaches.

title: Missing user reviews on car detail page
description: User reviews for certain cars are not displayed on the detailed information page. Users are unable to view feedback from other customers.
